content.title: You can’t use desertion as your reason for divorce
content.reason: For desertion to have taken place your {{ divorceWho }} must have left without your consent.
content.proceed: If you want to proceed with your divorce application, you must choose another fact which applies to you.

content.title: Ni allwch ddefnyddio’r ffaith fod eich gwr/gwraig wedi gadael yn rheswm dros ysgaru
content.reason: I ddefnyddio’r ffaith fod eich gwr/gwraig wedi gadael yn rheswm dros ysgaru  mae’n rhaid i’ch {{ divorceWho }} fod wedi gadael heb eich cydsyniad.
content.proceed: Os ydych am fwrw ymlaen gyda’ch cais am ysgariad, mae’n rhaid ichi ddewis ffaith arall sy’n berthnasol i chi.
